<noinclude>
This is the '''Class definition form''' template. It should be called in the following format:

<pre>
{{Class definition form }}
</pre>

==Test==
{{Class definition form }}
  
</noinclude><includeonly><form action="addToWiki" show-on-select="show-on-select">

<_create mwwrite="Wiki:Class definition/[Defines class]" noseo mwtemplate="Base properties" mwslot="ws-base-props" mwfollow mwfields="Class" />
<_create mwwrite="Wiki:Class definition/[Defines class]" noseo mwtemplate="Csp class properties" mwslot="ws-class-props" mwfields="Defines class, Pagetitle format, Allowed namespaces, Short description, Layout areas, Layout columns, Layout rows, Page properties template, Sidebar template"  />
<_create mwwrite="Wiki:Class definition/[Defines class]" noseo mwtemplate="wsnone" mwslot="ws-data" mwfollow mwfields="ws-data content" />

<input type="hidden" name="Class" value="Class definition" />
<input type="hidden" name="ws-data content" value="{
}" /><!-- empty json for _edit to work when editing parameter definitions after creating a class definition -->

<b>Class <span style="color:red">*</span></b>
<input name="Defines class" type="text" placeholder="Article, Organization, Person, Project" type="text" pattern="[a-zA-Z0-9-_\s]+" title="allowed characters: alphanumerical, spaces, '-' and '_' " class="form-control mb-3" required="required" /><!--

// Pagetitle format
--><b>Pagetitle format <span style="color:red">*</span></b>
<select name="Pagetitle format" class="form-control" >
  <input type="option" value="next_available" >next_available</input>
  <input type="option" value="title" >title</input>
</select>
<!--

// Allowed namespaces
--><b>Allowed namespaces</b>
<_token id="namespace-tokens" name="Allowed namespaces[]" multiple="multiple" class="form-control">
  <input type="option" value="(Main)">(Main)</input>
  {{#af_join:{{#af_map:{{#af_split:{{#spaces:}} |,}} |ns |<input type="option" value="{{{ns}}}">{{{ns}}}</input>}} }}
</_token>
<!--

// Layout fields

--><div class="mb-3">
<b>Layout <span style="color:red">*</span></b>
<input name="Layout areas" type="text" class="form-control" placeholder="Areas" required="required" value="'sub-header sidebar' 'main sidebar'" />
<i class="text-muted">example: 'sub-header sidebar' 'main sidebar' (Will set up: two rows, two columns; top left element will have the sub-header element, bottom left element will have the main element and both right elements will have the sidebar)</i>
<input name="Layout columns" type="text" class="form-control" placeholder="Columns" required="required" value="3fr 1fr" />
<i class="text-muted">example: 3fr 1fr (Will define: two columns, divided 75% for the left element and 25% for the right element)</i>
<input name="Layout rows" type="text" class="form-control" placeholder="Rows" required="required" value="auto 1fr" />
<i class="text-muted">example: auto 1fr (Will define: two rows, divided auto for the top element (will only take the space it needs), and 100% (of the rest) for the bottom element)</i><br/>
<span style="color:red; font-size:smaller">* Required fields</span>
</div>

<label><input type="checkbox" show-on-checked="optional-fields" /> Show optional fields</label>

<div class="hidden" show-on-select-trigger="optional-fields" >
<b>Short description</b>
<input name="Short description" type="textarea" class="form-control mb-3" rows="3" ></input>

<b>Page properties template</b>
<input name="Page properties template" type="text" placeholder="defaults to 'Template:Csp class properties'" type="text" pattern="[a-zA-Z0-9-_\s]+" title="allowed characters: alphanumerical, spaces, '-' and '_' " class="form-control mb-3" />
<b>Sidebar template</b>
<input name="Sidebar template" type="text" placeholder="defaults to 'Template:Csp default sidebar'" type="text" pattern="[a-zA-Z0-9-_\s]+" title="allowed characters: alphanumerical, spaces, '-' and '_' " class="form-control mb-3" />

</div><!-- end of .collapse -->

<div class="text-right"><input type="submit" class="btn btn-primary" value="Submit" /></div>

</form></includeonly>
